name: DatingSimulator
description:
This is a short game made for the Game Off 2022 jam! You will understand the link to the theme "cliché" when you start dating people!

In this game, you will meet an infinity of new characters and what happens with them are up to you! Very fun to play for 5 to 10 minutes!

Controls:

Tab -> Enable/disable fullcreen

Only use arrows and spacebar/enter to play
